attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You should bar tractors from the highways at peak traffic times.
Nothing more annoying when driving on dual carriageways to then have to que and dawdle along at a low speed because a tractor towing a trailer full of manure is causing a major queback or making a potential overtaking hazzord on main roads. 
Let them use the roads at anytime apart from morning and evening rush hour.
Also this would reduce our carbon footprint and pollution
